subject: Virtual Reality (Computers)
Football (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: By slipping on a headset, recruits can see what it is like to be in the team huddle, listen to a coach’s speech, run down the tunnel before a game or tour the campus.
snippet: By slipping on a headset, recruits can see what it is like to be in the team huddle, listen to a coach’s speech, run down the tunnel before a game or tour the campus.
